subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Italian cyclists Fausto Coppi and Gino Bartali battled each other during the 1940s and 1950s and created an explosive relationship that still captivates Italians.
snippet: Italian cyclists Fausto Coppi and Gino Bartali battled each other during the 1940s and 1950s and created an explosive relationship that still captivates Italians.
